revised_title: Estimation of Luminosity of Coloured Surfaces for Colour Discs
tldr: This article discusses the estimation of luminosity in colored surfaces used for color discs. The author, Major-General J. Waterhouse, presents a radiograph of the surface and explains the luminous and dark parts, which are made of different materials. The study is communicated by Sir W. de W. Abney, F.R.S.
